TEACHING INTERESTS Cloud computing, Computer and Networks Security, Wireless networks, Distributed Computing Systems, and Operating systems. EDUCATION Ph.D., Computer Science, University of Maryland (1986). B.E., Electronics & Comm. Eng., Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee (1980). Click here for my new book on Distributed Computing. Review my Operating Systems, Computer Networks, and Distributed Systems books at Amazon.com. Awards and Honors: Gartner Executives Meet UK's Gartner Endowed Chair. IEEE Fellow (since 2001, "For pioneering contributions to distributed computing systems"). IEEE Technical Achievement Award, 2003. Commissioned as "Kentucky Colonel" by the Governor of Kentucky (2003). Lumley Research Award, (for demonstrating excellence in research), College of Engineering, Ohio State University, 1998. Wethington Award (in recognition of outstanding competitive or prestigious extramural funding), College of Engineering, University of Kentucky, 2007. Above and Beyond the Call of Duty Award, National Science Foundation, June 2001. (For demonstrating an outstanding performance in processing of proposals in the Information Technology Research program.) Ameritech Faculty Fellow, 1997-98. National Merit Scholarship, Government of India, 1974. My Graduated Ph.D. students (1) Yelena Yesha (1989), (2) Ajay Kshemkalyani (1991), (3) Duane Buck (1993), (4) A. Gahlot (1993), (5) N. Journal Editorships Associate Editor, IEEE Trans. on Dependable and Secure Computing, (2010-). Associate Editor, IEEE Trans. on Parallel and Distributed Systems, (2006-2009). Associate Editor, IEEE Trans. on Computers, (2002-2006). Associate Editor, IEEE Trans. on Data and Knowledge Engineering, (1999-2004). Associate Editor, Journal of Pervasive and Mobile Computing, (2004-) Associate Editor, Journal of Ubiquitous Computing and Intelligence, (2006-). Editor, Computer Networks, (1999-2003). Recent Conference Organization General Co-Chair, IEEE Int'l Conference on Sensor Networks, Ubiquitous, and Trustworthy Computing, June 2008, Taiwan. Program Co-Chair, IEEE Int'l Conference on Sensor Networks, Ubiquitous, and Trustworthy Computing, June 2006, Taiwan. General Chair, Second IEEE International Conference on Security and Privacy for Emerging Areas in Communication Networks (SecureComm 2006), Baltimore. Program Co-Chair, 2nd IEEE International Conference on Mobile Ad-hoc and Sensor Systems (MASS'05), November 7-10, 2005, Washington, DC. General Chair, The 24th IEEE Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems, October 26-28, 2005, Orlando, FL. Vice Chair, Pervasive Communication Track, Third IEEE International Conference on Pervasive Computing and Communication (PerCom'05), Hawaii, March 2005.
